description.en: Once wielded by an ancient warrior, this sword was transformed into a flying vehicle. Pretty cool, huh?
description.ar: Once wielded by an ancient warrior, this sword was transformed into a flying vehicle. Pretty cool, huh?
description.br: Uma vez usado por um antigo guerreiro, esta espada foi transformada em um veículo voador. Muito legal, não é mesmo?
description.cns: 飞行器，使用时带你遨游天际。
description.de: Damals von einem uraltem Krieger getragen, nun zu einem Fluggerät umgewandelt. Ziemlich cool, oder?
description.fi: Once wielded by an ancient warrior, this sword was transformed into a flying vehicle. Pretty cool, huh?
description.fil: Once wielded by an ancient warrior, this sword was transformed into a flying vehicle. Pretty cool, huh?
description.fr: Jadis maniée par un guerrier, cette épée sert à présent de véhicule. Plutôt cool, non ?
description.id: Setelah digunakan oleh seorang prajurit kuno, pedang ini berubah menjadi kendaraan terbang. Kerenkan?
description.it: Once wielded by an ancient warrior, this sword was transformed into a flying vehicle. Pretty cool, huh?
description.nl: Once wielded by an ancient warrior, this sword was transformed into a flying vehicle. Pretty cool, huh?
description.pl: Once wielded by an ancient warrior, this sword was transformed into a flying vehicle. Pretty cool, huh?
description.ru: Once wielded by an ancient warrior, this sword was transformed into a flying vehicle. Pretty cool, huh?
description.sp: Una vez fue empuñada por un antiguo guerrero, esta espada se transformó en un vehículo volador. Muy guay, ¿eh?
description.sw: Once wielded by an ancient warrior, this sword was transformed into a flying vehicle. Pretty cool, huh?
description.th: เมื่อนักรบโบราณใช้ดาบเล่มนี้ ดาบเล่มนี้ถูกเปลี่ยนเป็นยานพาหนะที่บินได้ เจ๋งมากใช่มั้ย?
description.tw: 這把劍曾經被一位古代武士揮舞過，現在變成了飛行器。 很酷吧？！
description.vi: Từng được sử dụng bởi một chiến binh cổ đại, thanh kiếm này đã được biến thành một phương tiện bay. Khá tuyệt phải không?
